item.title: Docs: Other Samples and Tutorials
item.description:
Out of date

This guide contains outdated information pertaining to OpenDataology 1.0. This guide needs to be updated for OpenDataology 1.1.

Read the following tutorials to learn more about using OpenDataology Fairing to train and deploy on various environments such as on the Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

  • Learn how to train and deploy a model on GCP from a local notebook.
  • Learn how to train and deploy a model on GCP from a notebook hosted on OpenDataology.
  • Learn how to train and deploy a model on Azure from a notebook hosted on OpenDataology.
